description: Search manifest for AgentLoom repository - defines document collections for RAG and search indexing

collections.name: core
collections.description: High-level project documentation and governance references.

collections.name: agentloom-framework
collections.description: AgentLoom framework v3 - production-ready framework for building AI agents.

collections.name: framework-versions
collections.description: Historical framework versions (v1, v2, v3) for reference and evolution tracking.

collections.name: research
collections.description: Research materials including drafts, experiments, and figures.

collections.name: collaboration
collections.description: Contribution guides, templates, and case study documentation.

collections.name: archives
collections.description: Historical transcripts and editorial summaries for provenance.

collections.name: meta
collections.description: Metadata, manifests, and indexing support files.

collections.name: case-studies
collections.description: Production case studies validating framework stages.

notes.structure: Repository reorganized Dec 2025 - AgentLoom framework in agentloom-framework/, research materials in research/
notes.framework: AgentLoom v3 is the current production version
notes.search_priority: Core docs and agentloom-framework/agentLoom-v3/ should be prioritized for RAG indexing
